name: Quest for the Murder Sword
description:
Cannibal cultists excavated the corpse of the dead Kill-Giant Khrakrazh, searching for His unholy Murder Sword. But, for what foul purpose?

Quest for the Murder Sword is a system-agnostic dungeon delve into the cursed gut of a dead titan. Grab a torch, a sword and a couple of character sheets and get going! 

This was my contribution to the One Page Dungeon contest 2018.
